definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: For Saliou, the work in the mines goes on.
sentences.chinese: 對Saliou來說，礦山的工作還要繼續。

sentences.english: After the pit was closed tailings utilization and small fragmentary ore bodies development should be concerned.
sentences.chinese: 礦山閉坑後應繼續勘察開發零星礦體及綜合利用尾礦。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the treatment approach and the main safety measures of open-air abandoned mine.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了露天廢棄礦山治理方式及主要安全措施。

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roof, is one of disasters occuring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 礦山採場頂板冒落是地下礦山開採中常見的災害。

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roof, is one of disasters occuring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 礦山採場頂板冒落是地下礦山開採中常見的災害。

sentences.english: According to a legend the mine hides big fortune.
sentences.chinese: 據傳說礦山裏埋藏着巨大的財富。

sentences.english: Silicified limestone is extensively developed in the Xikuangshan antimony deposit.
sentences.chinese: 錫礦山銻礦硅化灰巖發育廣泛。

sentences.english: More than one thousand journalists traveled to the mine in the Atacama Desert to report on the rescue.
sentences.chinese: 一千多名記者乘坐的阿塔卡馬沙漠的礦山救援報告。

sentences.english: Roof fall in mines is one of the severe disasters in mining operation.
sentences.chinese: 礦山冒頂是礦山生產過程中嚴重災害之一。

sentences.english: Roof fall in mines is one of the severe disasters in mining operation.
sentences.chinese: 礦山冒頂是礦山生產過程中嚴重災害之一。

sentences.english: " Shidao red mine famous and known as "the first mine of stone.
sentences.chinese: 石島紅礦山馳名中外被譽爲“中國石材第一礦”。

sentences.english: Also for mining machinery industry has brought new opportunities and challenges.
sentences.chinese: 也爲礦山機械行業帶來了新的機遇和新的挑戰。

sentences.english: Mine shaft raised is the keg of mine production , move at high speed and word throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 礦井提升是礦山生產的咽喉，高速運行，常年工作。

sentences.english: Ground movements in the metal mines differ from those occurring in coalmines.
sentences.chinese: 金屬礦山岩層與地表移動有其自身特點。

sentences.english: After coal mining is finished, the ground is cultivated again and provided for former or new use.
sentences.chinese: 礦山閉坑後，土地將恢復成爲原來的耕地或新的用途。
